resources.string: Which co-founder of Reddit is also an instructor at Udacity?
Steve Huffman is one of the co-founder of reddit among above 4 also, an instructor at Udacity\'s Web Development course CS253.
The Reddit\'s logo and its mascot is a line drawing of an alien nicknamed \"Snoo\".
From June 18, 2008 until September 2017, Reddit was an open source project hosted on GitHub.
Which are the rewards/trophies given to a redditor?

As a way of saying thanks to the people who contribute to Reddit. There are so many trophies.

Open Sorcerer is given to someone who've contributed to Reddit's source code.

White hat is given to someone who've RESPONSIBLY probe and report any holes in the reddit code.

New User is given to someone who've Join Reddit!
What marks the anniversary day of the day you created your Reddit account?
Redditors commemorate their \"Cake Day\" once a year, on the anniversary of the day their account was created.
Which celebrities have participated in Reddit\'s Secret Santa Exchange?
Reddit started the largest Secret Santa program in the world, which is still in operation to date.\n\nBill Gates, Arnold Schwarzenegger and Snoop Dogg have participated in it.
